ANDROID.description: Designs and develops Android applications using Kotlin or Java.
ANDROID.qualification: B.Tech in CSE/IT, knowledge of Android SDK and mobile UI/UX.
ANDROID.future: Strong demand with increasing mobile-first applications.

BACKEND.description: Works on server-side application logic and integration of databases.
BACKEND.qualification: B.Tech in CSE/IT, strong in Node.js, Python, Java or Go.
BACKEND.future: Critical role in scalable system development and APIs.

DATABASE.description: Manages and maintains relational and NoSQL databases.
DATABASE.qualification: B.Tech or equivalent, expertise in SQL, MongoDB, etc.
DATABASE.future: Growing need for optimized data storage and management.

FRONTEND.description: Implements user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks.
FRONTEND.qualification: B.Tech in CSE/IT, React.js, Angular or Vue experience preferred.
FRONTEND.future: Essential for improving UX and responsive design.

IOS.description: Builds applications for Apple's iOS platform using Swift or Objective-C.
IOS.future: Increasing demand in premium app market and startups.

JAVA.description: Develops backend systems or enterprise applications using Java.
JAVA.qualification: Strong Java skills, knowledge of Spring or Hibernate frameworks.
JAVA.future: Stable demand in enterprise and banking sectors.

MOBILE.description: Develops cross-platform or native mobile applications.
MOBILE.qualification: Familiarity with Flutter, React Native or platform-specific SDKs.
MOBILE.future: Surge in mobile-first app development across industries.

PYTHON.description: Uses Python for backend development, automation, or data tasks.
PYTHON.qualification: Good Python knowledge with Django, Flask or data libraries.
PYTHON.future: Dominant in automation, AI/ML and web backends.

SDE.description: General Software Development Engineer role across systems or products.
SDE.qualification: Solid DSA, problem solving, and system design skills.
SDE.future: High-demand job with vast application in tech companies.

TESTING.description: Ensures software quality via manual or automated testing.
TESTING.qualification: Knowledge of QA practices, Selenium, JUnit or Cypress.
TESTING.future: Important role with test automation growing rapidly.

WEB.description: Full-stack or web-focused developer building websites and web apps.
WEB.qualification: HTML, CSS, JS, backend tech like PHP/Node or Python.
WEB.future: Web development is universal and evergreen.
